description:
Learn to speak in French via phrasebook, tutorials. Fast, easy and fun way to learn French.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search and  bookmark and facebook integration.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for YOU in French. Anytime, Anywhere.

Meeting friends and co-workers from France could be much more fun with this app..

Focus is on every day phrases and words and app is categorized by following topics:



Includes following tutorials:

 Why Learn French,

 Tips for Effective Language Learning,

 Gender and Number,

 Personal Pronouns,

 Verbs,

 Definite Indefinite Articles and Demonstratives,

 Relatives and Interrogatives,

 Numbers and Measures,

 Vocabulary.


Includes following PhraseBooks:

 Greetings and General Words,

 Phrases for Courtesy,

 Food, Drink and Going Out,

 Places, People and Family,

 Sports and The Outdoors,

 Dating,

 General Questions,

 Travelling Around,

 Police Emergency,

 Medical and Disaster Emergency,

 Shopping.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
